songs.album: The Hegelian Dialectic (The Book of Revelation)
songs.title: Mr. President
songs.lyrics:
When carrying out attacks on other nations, destroying their infrastructure and deforming their future generations, the imperialist needs to rewrite history and keep repeating it over and over until it becomes true

President Truman: Young lady with the red hair right behind the schoolteacher there
Student: Mr. President, why did you drop the atom bomb?
President Truman: I made the only decision I ever knew how to make. I did what I thought was right
